title: 'Nice purchase'
body: I just received the amazon package. This package was however tempered and tapped externally (tape didn't carry Amazon logo print), so probably checked by some one, mid between the curior transection. Now, about the product:  A. Positives: 1. Pillow size is as expected. 2. Soft feel.  B. Negatives: 1. Getting heated faster, after putting head over it. 2. Fabric carries wide patch-joints (spread approx. 1/3rd of the top and bottom surfaces. Which was not expected, as not matching with the pre-purchase description/displayed image. So, disappointed. 3. The product price is also higher then the local market. In this price (199 INR), one can get a high quality Natural Cotton filled pillow of the same size (This is a synthetic-fibre filled pillow).
